intro.title: The World's First Platform Connecting Quantum Biology, Human Frequency Science, Ancient Alkaline Wisdom and AI-Powered Transformation
intro.welcome: Welcome to My Alkaline Vegan Journey — an AI-First Human Frequency Transformation Platform where quantum physics meets ancient wisdom.
intro.para1: Welcome to My Alkaline Vegan Journey — an AI-First Human Frequency Transformation Platform where quantum physics meets ancient wisdom.
intro.quantum1: Quantum entanglement proves every breath you take connects you to everything in the universe. Your cells are literally entangled with the food you consume, the air you breathe, and the people around you. This isn't metaphysics—it's physics.
intro.bridge: We connect quantum mechanics (entanglement, tunneling, coherence) with biochemistry (acetogenins, flavonoids, minerals) and ancient wisdom (Dr. Sebi, alkaline nutrition, frequency medicine). Every product is hand-harvested from the volcanic soil of St. Lucia. Every compound is mapped to frequency, chakra, and sacred geometry. Every claim is supported by peer-reviewed research.
intro.para2: We connect quantum mechanics (entanglement, tunneling, coherence) with biochemistry (acetogenins, flavonoids, minerals) and ancient wisdom (Dr. Sebi, alkaline nutrition, frequency medicine). Every product is hand-harvested from the volcanic soil of St. Lucia. Every compound is mapped to frequency, chakra, and sacred geometry. Every claim is supported by peer-reviewed research.
intro.story: My name is Robin, and in 2021 I completed a 40-day Total Reset Detox: 3 days completely dry (no water, no water contact) followed by 37 days of pure water fasting. Using the equivalence formula (1 dry day = 3 water days), this reset equaled 46 days of water fasting. This experience purged my system at the cellular level, allowing my body's natural frequency to resonate freely. It changed everything — my health, my clarity, my mission. This platform exists to help YOU achieve the same transformation.
intro.para3: Throughout this site, you'll discover: frequency healing science, alkaline vegan nutrition protocols, quantum biology research, AI-powered personalized wellness plans, volcanic superfoods from St. Lucia, and a global community resonating at higher frequencies.
intro.discover: Throughout this site, you'll discover: frequency healing science, alkaline vegan nutrition protocols, quantum biology research, AI-powered personalized wellness plans, volcanic superfoods from St. Lucia, and a global community resonating at higher frequencies.
intro.quantum2: Quantum tunneling allows particles to pass through barriers that classical physics says are impossible. Your cells use the same mechanism for healing and regeneration.

math.title: Quantum Reset Math Challenge
math.description:
Robin's 2021 Total Reset Detox:

• 3 days DRY (no water, no contact)

Rule: 1 dry day = 3 water days

Calculate the equivalence!
math.wrong: Try again! Remember: 1 dry day = 3 water days

quiz.title: Biochemical Compound Challenge
quiz.question: Which compound in soursop leaves is 10,000 times more potent than chemotherapy at killing cancer cells?
quiz.correct: CORRECT! Annonacin inhibits mitochondrial Complex I!
quiz.wrong: Not quite! This compound is an acetogenin.
